abstract: Why we owe Will Shortz an arm sling.
snippet: Why we owe Will Shortz an arm sling.
lead_paragraph: SPECIAL POST - Many readers have asked about the number of entries received in Patrick Berry's "Crossing" Words Contest and how the drawing was to be made. I don't know if this is some sort of record for a puzzle contest, but I was impressed not only by the sheer volume of entries but by how smart you all are. Approximately 96% percent of you submitted the correct answer, so pat yourselves on the back for outwitting Mr. Berry.

headline.main: The Entry Count and the Drawing
